General.Name: ZKTECO Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: ZKTeco Co., Ltd. provides biometric verification algorithm techniques, sensors, and software platform worldwide. It offers solutions based on smart verification and identity authentication applications for vertical industries, partners, and system integrators. The company provides body temperature and mask detection devices; visible light products; biometric T&A, RFID attendance, and portable devices; access control devices and accessories; entrance control products; video surveillance products; smart lock products; biometrics readers; and POS terminal and peripherals. ZKTeco Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Dongguan, China.
General.Address: No.32, Pingshan Industrial Road, Dongguan, China, 523710
